item.title: Cracking Multivariate Recursive Equations Using Generating Functions
item.description: In this post, we consider a combinatorial problem. It has a nice recursive solution, which could be implemented efficiently using Dynamic Programming (DP) technique. Then using generating function, we find the closed formula, expressed with the binomial coefficients. Finaly, we show that the closed formula gives us much faster way to compute the result than the DP solution. Generating functions are usually applied to the case of single variable recursive equations.
